dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Hydrated Portland cement waste; Set cement debris; Cementitious waste materials; Construction and demolition cement residue; Hardened cement waste
Hydrated Portland cement waste; Set cement debris; Cementitious waste materials; Construction and demolition cement residue; Hardened cement waste
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The product flow described pertains to waste cement that has undergone hydration. It denotes cement that has been mixed with water and has set, typically as a result of construction activities or demolition waste. The processing level implies it is a byproduct or waste material, with technical specifics related to its post-consumption state.It is part of a waste stream and compliance with standards for waste handling may apply. The quality reflects its condition as a hydrated and set material, which may impact its potential for reuse or recycling. Information on its production route can include the initial manufacturing of cement, its educt name being Portland cement or similar, and its use in construction activities resulting in its waste state. The availability is likely at the location of construction or demolition sites, specified as 'from construction site' or similar terms

该产品流描述的是发生水化作用的废弃水泥。它指的是与水混合并凝固的水泥，通常是由于建筑活动或拆除废料产生的。其加工水平意味着它是一种副产品或废料，与其消费后状态有关的技术细节可能应用废物处理标准。其质量反映了它作为水化和凝固材料的状况，这可能影响其重新使用或回收的潜力。有关其生产路线的信息可以包括水泥的最初制造、其原料名为波特兰水泥或类似物质，以及其在建筑活动中的使用导致其变成废料状态。其可用性可能在建筑或拆除现场，具体表述为'来自建筑工地'或类似术语。
